page.title: 12BROUGHTY FERRY- LIFESTYLES
page.content: {A DAY IN MY LIFE} {THURSDAY 20th JUNE MARK'S DAY} 07.00 Got up, washed and had breakfast 07.30 Watched T.V. A.M. 08.00 Big brother Philip left for work 08.30 Left for School 09.00 School bell rang, started work 09.30 Started gym lesson 10.30 Playtime and Tuck-shop 10.50 End of playtime, started Maths 12.10 Dinner Time 13.30 School resumes. Painting pictures of Nelson's flagship Victory 14.30 Playtime 14.45 Playtime ends. Worked on computers 15.45 End of School. Went home 17.00 Had tea, went out to play 18.30 Went to swimming club 19.30 Returned home and had supper 20.30 Washed and went to bed 21.00 Lights out
